snippet: The networking equipment company’s upbeat report came after weeks of disappointing earnings results in the technology industry.
abstract: Cisco Systems' upbeat earnings report comes after weeks of disappointing results in the technology industry; releases fiscal first-quarter report that was better than most of Wall Street had expected with net income up 18 percent to $2.1 billion, or 39 cents a share, from $1.8 billion, or 33 cents a share, a year ago; revenue rose 6 percent to $11.9 billion from $11.3 billion a year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The networking equipment company’s upbeat report came after weeks of disappointing earnings results in the technology industry.

headline.main: Cisco’s Net Income Climbs, Beating Wall St. Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Cisco’s Net Income Climbs, Beating Wall St. Forecasts
